subtitle: had an experience where on the summer
solstice I happened to be watching at
the time David Lynch version of the
movie Dune and there's a part of that
movie where Lynch who is like a Buddhist
Meditation practitioner he has an image
of like the darkness of space and then
he has a an image of an illuminated hand
coming out of space and then the word
sleeper must awaken and that's what
awakens the protagonist Paul traes but
when that happened it was like a trigger
to see that illuminated hand out of
black space in the word sleeper must
awake I felt something open up in the
center of my head like a flower and I
was only barely even aware of the
concepts of chakras and lotus flowers
and these types of things at that time
and I began to have a spontaneous
awareness of non-physical world's
realities beings around us you know it's
interesting that rudol Steiner refers to
the process of spiritual Clairvoyance as
a kind of controlled psychosis and so it
is a very challenging thing to open up
our Consciousness to non-physical Realms
and not have it be very destabilizing
